overview_of_class: This practicum provides students with the experience of embedding in a professional newsroom for an extended period and is aimed at advanced level reporting and story creation/production skills so that by the end of the practicum the student will be working at the professional level of the media outlet at which he/she is embedded. Other skills learned include team production of in-depth stories and multimedia.
name: Practicum
title: JOUR JOUR 498-0-20 Practicum
